dmca.title: Abuse complaint regarding the server located at [67.15.127.14] flashgameweb.com Case
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at www.ev1servers.net/About/dmca.aspx

Legal Response Team

-----Original Message-----
From: Francis [mailto:francis@vanbeveren.eu] 
Posted At: Tuesday, October 10, 2006 8:28 PM
Posted To: DMCA Houston
Conversation: Abuse complaint regarding the server located at
[67.15.127.14] flashgameweb.com Case Number: 8862
Subject: Fw: Abuse complaint regarding the server located at
[67.15.127.14] flashgameweb.com Case Number: 8862
Importance: High


Hi,

In juni this year you removed a copy off my website
www.spelletjescentrum.eu from a server of one of your clients. This
client has uploaded this copy again to
http://www.oyunweb.com/flashgameweb/

I was checking my website stats an I found this websites because it was
linking my files as you can see in the source of
http://www.oyunweb.com/flashgameweb/game.php
One off the files is http://www.spelletjescentrum.eu/i/2/gp/mt4.gif

Regards,
Francis van Beveren


> ----- Original Message -----
> From: "Everyones Internet DMCA Agent" <dmca@ev1.net>
> To: <francis@vanbeveren.eu>
> Sent: Saturday, June 03, 2006 10:21 PM
> Subject: Abuse complaint regarding the server located at 
> [67.15.127.14] flashgameweb.com Case Number: 8862
>
>
>> Your Reference Number: flashgameweb.com Our Case Number: 8862
>>
>>
>> , , .
>>
>> Sir,
>>
>> We feel that the user in question in this violation has successfully 
>> removed the material in question regarding the abuse complaint and
have 
>> closed the case in our records, as of 6/3/2006 3:21:00 PM.
>>
>> The offending URL(S) was:  http://www.flashgameweb.com. If you have
any 
>> questions, please contact us at chrisn@ev1servers.net and 
>> abuse@ev1servers.net.   Referencing 8862
>>
>> -- 
>>
>> Regards,
>> Abuse Team
>> EV1Servers.net
>> abuse@ev1servers.net
>>
>
